dct_title_s: A correct map of the Bay of San Francisco and the gold region from actual survey June 20th. 1849 for J.J. Jarves
dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map given in "Miles."
"Entered according to Act of Congress in the Year 1849 by Jas. Monroe & Co. in the Clerks [O]ffice of the District Court of Mass."
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
